items.sentence: I wonder whether or not Tom has another one.
Tom closed the book and turned off the lamp.
My mother and father aren\'t home right now.
By the way, I\'ve got to tell you something.
Tom needs to be told that he can\'t do that.
She claims that she knows nothing about him.
Would you please write with a ballpoint pen?
Tom abandoned the hope of becoming an actor.
Tom acknowledged that he had made a mistake.
Tom acted happy, but deep inside he was sad.
Tom read Mary\'s letter over and over again.
Do you know anything about Tom\'s childhood?
Tom isn\'t the only person in the classroom.
Do you really think that we\'re that stupid?
We have to tell people what they need to do.
We shouldn\'t judge people by how they look.
Tom is by far the smartest kid in our class.
Tom is crying because he got stung by a bee.
Tom is going to the airport to pick Mary up.
I haven\'t eaten dairy products for a while.
